fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check a player each night. If they're a Horseman, you will recruit them and allow them to win with you and any other Horsemen.
- Empower a recruited Horseman for the night.
- Attack a player. You can only use this if all other Horsemen are dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you have recruited at least one Horseman, you will form a factional chat with them. This chat will be closed if you die, however.
- All other Horsemen abilities will have no effect on you.
- You cannot be decieved by frames or disguises.
- You cannot Empower until you have recruited every living Horseman. You will be notified when it's available.
- Each Horseman role should describe the specific benefit it gains when Empowered.
- Roleblock, Conversion, and Detection Immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recruit all living Horsemen and lead them to victory.
